review_en: It was a unique place in Ikseon-dong. It just seemed like a very clear identity among women's clothing stores! The store was quite spacious when I went in rather than looking at the entrance. I really liked the clothes called a waistcoat. It's like a lap skirt, so I got it for a date.There was a bright dress and a dress that was walking with her. I'm going to take my other friends.

review_en: I looked around for a long time because the interior of the pretty living hanbok house and Hanbok were all so pretty. Maybe it's because it's a daily Hanbok, but it's affordable for hanbok, and I bought a pair to wear on a trip with my mom, but it's okay to wear them on a regular basis. It's impossible to try it on at the Hanbok restaurant, but I think it was nice to try it on and choose it comfortably. It was good that the staff helped me kindly. If you go through Ikseon-dong Alley, it will be hard to find it because it stands out.

review_en: It's good enough to buy a special Korean souvenir. I bought some Korean souvenirs here! Hanbok dresses, skirts and accessories every day. They have only beautiful items. Especially, I would like to recommend accessories for foreign tourists! What a cute and unique style! If u is looking for a special gift, please visit here.
